$eref.description: Root class for all Databook entities
$eref.title: DataEntity

___type.description: The type of the Databook entity

___submitted.description: Submission time of the Databook entity

___title.description: A title of the Databook entity. This is the canonical name of the entity. For example, for a collection/data object, this is the path, and for a user this is the user name

___created.description: Create time of the Databook entity

___accessHistory.description: A history of accesses to the Databook entitiy

___accessPermission.description: The access permission of the Databook entity

___hasPart.description: A part of the Databook entity

___description.description: A description of the Databook entity

___partOf.description: A part of which the Databook entity is

___related.description: A related Databook entity to the Databook entity

___owner.description: The owner of the Databook entity

___contributor.description: The contributors of the Databook entity

___id.description: The identifier for the Databook entity

___storageLocationRequest.description: Request for where this entity is stored
